title: Scrabble
summary: Join us for a relaxed afternoon of Scrabble and good company. All abilities welcome - whether you're a seasoned wordsmith or just enjoy a friendly game.

title: Line Dancing
summary: A fun and friendly weekly line dancing session suitable for all levels. No partner needed - just come along and join in. £5 per session.

title: Coffee Morning
summary: Drop in for tea, coffee and conversation. A welcoming weekly get-together for villagers and visitors alike - everyone is welcome.

title: Armchair Yoga
summary: Gentle seated yoga designed to improve flexibility, balance and overall wellbeing. Suitable for all abilities. £5 per session.

title: Patchwork Group
summary: Bring along your sewing projects and enjoy an afternoon of patchwork, quilting and friendly chat. All experience levels welcome.

title: Community Crafting Day
summary: Come along to our FREE Community Crafting Day and enjoy an afternoon of creativity and fun. Bring the family - all materials are provided and everyone is welcome. Due to limited numbers this is a ticketed event. For information and bookings ring 01759 301931.
